## Summary of `mtcars` dataset

```{r}

summary(mtcars)
```

```{r}
# Load ggplot2
library(ggplot2)

# Create a scatter plot of mpg vs wt
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "MPG vs Weight", x = "Weight (1000 lbs)", y = "Miles per Gallon")
```
